line: Do it then. Eddie Turner let's start with you. Look straight into that camera you've got 30 seconds give us your pitch. Well I am extremely passionate about technology and learning and I am very interesting in using my years of experience in technology support and teching combined with my North Western education to help manage an organization's technology project team. Or an organization that has a learning and talent development department. I'd love to help them power up their employee engaugement through the use of technologies such as social media and the Apple iPhone. Look at that. Right on the money. And you're very good with time.
